productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #361 in Our Brands (See Top 100 in Our Brands) #26 in Facial Cleansing Washes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not the worst wash out there tbh. I've never had acne before in my life until now because if a medication side effect. I'm used to psoriasis everywhere, but the injections I'm on (which cleared up the psoriasis) but has caused a lot of acne breakouts. I alternate this wash with 1 of 2 of my regular face washes (elf minty foaming cleanser or the boscia charcoal cleanser) and it's hasn't worsened the acne and it hasn't irritated the psoriasis still present on my face. This product is super drying tho, so def go in with a good moisturizer and don't over use this. Best bet is talking it over with a derm tho. And as always w most acne products, many increase sun sensitivity so like sun protection lol if you wanna use this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT Clean & Clear Dupe!
reviews.reviewText: I was devastated when the Clean and Clear Acne Cleanser was discontinued so I decided to try this wash out (the price is super comparable and affordable). I can’t tell any difference and this wash cleared my skin right back up. My face did get SLIGHTLY more dry than the norm (nothing huge), so I’d suggest keeping that in mind with moisturizer. The texture is super soft and smooth on the skin. Other than that I am super happy with this purchase and will definitely continue to purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Excellent if not sensitive to Hydrogen Peroxide. If you are, it may make you itch wherever it touches. Like in the shower. Rinsing causes it to wash downward and skin might itch. Such be aware

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Same Product At 1/2 The Cost
reviews.reviewText: I've been using 10% Benzoyl Peroxide for a while. It's very effective and works extremely well. About a month ago I decided to try this Amazon Basics brand because the price was so much less. Guess what? It looks, smells, feels and works exactly the same as my previous brand! No brainer. Same product at half the cost!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Careful for sensitive skin.
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive skin & when I first used it, I put it all over my face but then my face burned & turned fire red. So now, I just put it on my cheeks for 20 seconds. And it hasn't given me a burn reaction since. It does have a smell like clean smell & to me it strong but but but it has made my cheeks nice & clean, as well as smooth & moisturized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product for Its Price!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I started to develop a little bit of acne due to stress and decided to give this product a try. Not only did it come by very fast, but it works very effectively and quickly! I only used it for a week, and I can see the difference in my skin and I am very happy with the results. The only issue is the smell as it does not really have a scent but if you can get passed that, the product is perfect for its price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really wanted to love this but it didn’t foam at all. I was wearing a lot of makeup so I used a removing cloth first and this product STILL did NOT remove my foundation! I was shocked! I used a LOT of product too! Also, the menthol smell was strong and unnecessary? Why? I do not have sensitive skin, but it left my face a little swollen, red in places and blotchy after use. Finally, after rinsing thoroughly, it felt like a slick layer of product was still left on my face. Yuck. I was visiting my family across the country, so threw it away- other, I’d have returned it immediately.
